message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE. 

The paper focuses on matching based question answering in Chinese, which involves natural language processing and information retrieval. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper proposes a novel CNN model for this task, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also conducts experiments to evaluate the proposed model, which falls under the sub-category of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper deals with text matching, which is a common problem in information retrieval, and hence, it could also belong to the sub-category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
